name: Habitica Dark Theme
description: Reduce eye strain with a dark theme for Habitica. It also reduces the amount of distractions on the screen, condenses the task items, and hides some of the RPG elements on the task page. Optimised for desktop use.
additional_info:
Version 1. 14 Feb 2019
- Initial release

Version 1.0.2. 15 Feb 2019
- Fix modals and popups
- Applied dark style to more areas
